title: Best of The Herd for Jan 20, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Jan 20, 2020
description:
Colin talks about how the Packers were always a fraudulent team and had no shot against the 49ers. He thinks Patrick Mahomes and the Chiefs are the perfect team to take advantage of the newer rules in the NFL. He says Aaron Rodgers bails on things too early and against the 49ers he completely bailed on the game. Colin admits where he was right and wrong over the past week. Plus, FOX NFL Analyst and Chiefs legend Tony Gonzalez comes in studio to talk about what sets the Chiefs organization apart and why its a tough match-up against the 49ers in Super Bowl 54

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
